categories.description: Items that can be traded to Relic Seeker Scrounge for Rosaries.

items.description: On a high-up ledge. Left from Mosshome.
items.label: Choral Commandment 1

items.description: Top-Left Room of Whiteward.
items.label: Choral Commandment 2

items.description: At the end of a room above the Hidden Passage in Whiteward, easiest to reach via Silk Soar.
items.label: Choral Commandment 3

items.description: Can be purchased from Jubilana (Songclave) for 210 Rosaries. Requires 'The Lost Merchant Wish' completed.
items.label: Choral Commandment 4

items.description: In a secret room above Bone Bottom. Easiest to reach with Drifter's Cloak and floating down from above.
items.label: Weaver Effigy 1

items.description: Shellwood Witch Tunnel. Requires Cling Grip.
items.label: Weaver Effigy 2

items.description: Bottom right of the Slab. Found on a corpse.
items.label: Weaver Effigy 3

items.description: Greymore Secret Room. Swim all the way to the right.
items.label: Bone Scroll 1

items.description: Far Fields secret room. Reachable with Drifter's Cloak.
items.label: Bone Scroll 2

items.description: Left side of Underworks, behind a breakable wall.
items.label: Bone Scroll 3

items.description: Top of Wisp Thicket platform challenge.
items.label: Bone Scroll 4

items.description: On a high-up ledge in Weavernest Atla.
items.label: Rune Harp 1

items.description: Secret room in Far Fields Weaver nest (Sprint Challenge).
items.label: Rune Harp 2

items.description: Found where Conductor Ballador would be in Act 3.
items.label: Rune Harp 3

items.description: Behind a platforming sequence in the Abyss.
items.label: Arcane Egg

categories.label: Relics

categories.description: They are cylinders inscribed with recordings, which may be heard by bringing them to Vaultkeeper Cardinius.

items.description: Sold by Grindle for 240 Rosaries (Blasted Steps).
items.label: Psalm Cylinder - Grindle

items.description: Obtained from Vaultkeeper Cardinius in the Whispering Vaults.
items.label: Psalm Cylinder - Vaultkeeper Cardinius Lair

items.description: At the end of a parkour challenge at the top of the Whispering Vaults. Requires Clawline.
items.label: Psalm Cylinder - Whispering Vaults

items.description: Behind a breakable wall in High Halls. Requires Clawline.
items.label: Psalm Cylinder - High Halls

items.description: Behind a breakable wall at the top of Underworks.
items.label: Psalm Cylinder - Underworks

items.description: Whispering Vaults: part of the Vaultkeeper's Melody objective.
items.label: Sacred Cylinder

categories.label: Cylinder

categories.description: Crystallized essences of Pharloom's forces, gathered to empower tools and relics.

items.description: Given to Moss Druid during the Berry Picking wish.

items.description: Given by Moss Druid during the Great Taste of Pharloom wish.
items.label: Mossberry Stew

items.description: Dropped by pilgrim enemies during the Garb of the Pilgrims wish.
items.label: Pilgrim Shawl

items.description: Found in Deep Docks.
items.label: Flintstone

items.description: Dropped by Flintbeetles.
items.label: Flintgem

items.description: Rare element found naturally within the rock and bone of Pharloom.
items.label: Craftmetal

items.description: Dropped by Hokers during the Flexile Spines wish.
items.label: Spine Core

items.description: Dropped by Skull Tyrant during the The Terrible Tyrant wish.
items.label: Crown Fragment

items.description: Dropped by Savage Beastfly during the Savage Beastfly wish.
items.label: Horn Fragment

items.description: Found throughout Bellhart during the Silver Bells wish.
items.label: Silver Bell

items.description: Bile gland of a rare sylphean slug. Talented pinmasters can use the glistening liquid within to improve a blade's sharpness.
items.label: Pale Oil

items.description: Collected using the Needle Phial during the Alchemist's Assistant wish.
items.label: Plasmium

items.description: Collected using the Needle Phial during the Advanced Alchemy wish.
items.label: Plasmified Blood

items.description: Dropped by Craw enemies during the Crawbug Clearing wish.
items.label: Ragpelt

items.description: Core of a flower formed around the body of a consumed Wood Wasp. Secretes a sticky sap that the wasps subsist on.
items.label: Pollip Heart

items.description: Dropped by Muckroachs during the Roach Guts wish.
items.label: Roach Guts

items.description: Given by Tipp & Pill during Delivery Wishes.
items.label: Courier's Swag

items.description: Given by Tipp & Pill during the Queen's Egg wish.
items.label: Queen's Egg

items.description: Given by Tipp & Pill during the Liquid Lacquer wish.
items.label: Liquid Lacquer

items.description: Given by Tipp & Pill during the Great Taste of Pharloom wish.
items.label: Courier's Rasher

items.description: Sold by Creige during the Great Taste of Pharloom wish.
items.label: Vintage Nectar

items.description: Dropped by Disgraced Chef Lugoli.
items.label: Pickled Muckmaggot

items.description: Found in Sands of Karak.
items.label: Crustnut

items.description: Sold by Crull and Benjin during the Infestation Operation wish.
items.label: Steel Spines

items.description: Dropped by pilgrim enemies in The Citadel during the Cloaks of the Choir wish.
items.label: Choir Cloak

items.description: Found in Brightvein.
items.label: Magnetite

items.description: Dropped by Broodmother.
items.label: Broodmother's Eye

items.description: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been seared in a way that noticeably affects the flavour.
items.label: Seared Organ

items.description: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been diced into fine chunks.
items.label: Shredded Organ

items.description: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been cleanly speared through, but is otherwise intact.
items.label: Skewered Organ

items.description: Found in Voltnest.
items.label: Voltridian

items.description: Given by Bell Hermit during the Silk and Soul wish.
items.label: Hermit's Soul

items.description: Given by Chapel Maid during the Silk and Soul wish.
items.label: Maiden's Soul

items.description: Found in Bilewater after defeating Groal the Great.
items.label: Seeker's Soul

items.description: Awarded after defeating Crust King Khann in Coral Tower.
items.label: Encrusted Heart

items.description: Awarded after defeating Nyleth in Shellwood.
items.label: Pollen Heart

items.description: Awarded after defeating Skarrsinger Karmelita in Far Fields.
items.label: Hunter's Heart

items.description: Awarded after defeating the Clover Dancers in Lost Verdania.

categories.label: Materium

categories.description: Keepsakes given by allies or obtained through notable encounters. Some may hold sentimental value.

items.description: Given by Nuu after completing most of the entries in the Hunter's Journal.
items.label: Hunter's Memento

items.description: Dropped by Watcher at the Edge after defeating them in combat.
items.label: Grey Memento

items.description: A token awarded by the Guardian for triumph in the Flea Games.
items.label: Guardian's Memento

items.description: Gifted by the Sprintmaster after proving unmatched agility.
items.label: Sprintmaster Memento

items.description: Awarded after defeating Crawfather in the Court of Craws.
items.label: Craw Memento

items.description: Awarded by Garmond - a symbol of perseverance through peril.
items.label: Hero's Memento

items.description: Found at the far east corner of the Nameless Town.
items.label: Surface Memento

items.description: Awarded after defeating Nyleth in Shellwood. (This is missable since you can only get one heart-related memento.)
items.label: Pollen Heart

items.description: Awarded after defeating Crust King Khann in Coral Tower. (This is missable since you can only get one heart-related memento per save file.)
items.label: Encrusted Heart

items.description: Awarded after defeating Skarrsinger Karmelita in Far Fields. (This is missable since you can only get one heart-related memento per save file.)
items.label: Hunter's Heart

items.description: Awarded after defeating the Clover Dancers in Lost Verdania. (This is missable since you can only get one heart-related memento per save file.)
items.label: Conjoined Heart

categories.label: Mementos

categories.description: Sweet berries with poisonous seeds, that grow in moist environments. Initially gathered as a part of a wish, later used to trade for Rosaries and other rewards.

items.description: In Moss Grotto, in the room above and to the left of the starting area.
items.label: Mossberry #1

items.description: Found in Moss Grotto: Pogo off of a nearby Mossmir to reach it.
items.label: Mossberry #2

items.description: Moss Grotto (Bone Bottom): Held by a flying enemy high above the settlement. Moves into a room east of here in ACT 3.
items.label: Mossberry #3

items.description: Moss Grotto (Mosshome): Held by a flying enemy(Aknid).
items.label: Mossberry #4

items.description: Moss Grotto (Bonegrave): Held by an enemy flying(Aknid) high above this area.
items.label: Mossberry #5

items.description: In Weavenest Atla: Found growing from a ceiling.
items.label: Mossberry #6

items.description: In the Memorium, in the room east of the bench.
items.label: Mossberry #7

categories.label: Mossberries

categories.description: Consume the Silkeater to retrieve a cocoon after falling in battle.

items.description: Greymoor, in the top of the tower west of Halfway Home.
items.label: Silkeater #1

items.description: Deep Docks, in the room southeast of the sauna bench.
items.label: Silkeater #2

items.description: Inside the Exhaust Organ.
items.label: Silkeater #3

items.description: In the centre of Whiteward.
items.label: Silkeater #4

items.description: Choral Chambers: West of the Grand Bellway.
items.label: Silkeater #5

items.description: Chroal Chambers: East of the Great Gourmand's dining room.
items.label: Silkeater #6

items.description: Whispering Vaults, in the room directly above Vaultkeeper Cardinius's lair.
items.label: Silkeater #7

items.description: The Cradle, below the Terminus.
items.label: Silkeater #8

items.description: In the eastern area of Blasted Steps, east of where Shakra appears ( This Silkeater is replaced by Steel Seer Zi in Steel Soul Mode.).
items.label: Silkeater #9

categories.label: Silkeater

categories.description: Small sculpture, inexpertly but painstakingly crafted as a symbol of enduring friendship.

items.description: Gifted to Hornet by Flick the Fixer after completing every Wish from the Bone Bottom Wishwall.
items.label: Hornet Statuette
items.use: Can be used from the inventory to gain 60 shell shards.

categories.label: Hornet Statuette

categories.description: Maps have to be obtained before an area will appear on the in-game map.

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
items.label: Mosslands Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. These docks, I thought them small when I first passed. Now I feel the structure's true bulk hides below the molten lake.
items.label: Deep Docks Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. TWide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
items.label: Greymoor Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom's core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
items.label: Bellhart Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
items.label: Shellwood Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
items.label: Hunter's March Map

items.description: Obtained from a Lore Tablet.
items.label: Underworks Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
items.label: Sands of Karak Map

items.description: Obtained from the shell of a dead bug.
items.label: Slab Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
items.label: Mount Fay Map

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. Swamps born in the Citadel's shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
items.label: Bilewater Map

items.description: Obtained from an abandoned camp.
items.label: Verdania Map

items.description: Obtained from a Lore Tablet.
items.label: Abyss Map

items.description: Obtained from a mechanism.
items.label: Cogwork Core Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine.
items.label: Whispering Vaults Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine in Act 2. Found next to a broken map machine in Act 3.
items.label: Cradle Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine.
items.label: Memorium Map

items.description: Obtained from a desk.
items.label: Putrefied Ducts Map

items.description: Obtained from a Lore Tablet.
items.label: Weavenest Atla Map

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
items.label: Far Fields Map

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
items.label: The Marrow Map

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
items.label: Wormways Map

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. Huge caves ascending to Pharloom's Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
items.label: Blasted Steps Map

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
items.label: Sinners Road Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine.
items.label: High Halls Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine.
items.label: Choral Chambers Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine.
items.label: Grand Gate Map

items.description: Obtained from a map machine.
items.label: Whiteward Map

categories.label: Maps

categories.description: Writing implement for recording one's travels. Can be used to update any acquired maps.

items.description: Writing implement for recording one's travels. Can be used to update any acquired maps.
items.label: Quill (White)

items.description: Writing implement for recording one's travels. Can be used to update any acquired maps.
items.label: Quill (Red)
items.obtain: Take from Trobbio's desk in Act 2 if a Quill is not already owned.

items.description: Writing implement for recording one's travels. Can be used to update any acquired maps.
items.label: Quill (Purple)
items.obtain: Take from Trobbio's desk in Act 3 if a Quill is not already owned.

categories.label: Quills

categories.description: Markers purchased from Shakra to mark key locations across Pharloom.

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
items.label: Bench Pin

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. These pins will mark vendors on your map.
items.label: Vendor Pins

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. These pins will mark stations on your map.
items.label: Bellway Pins

items.description: Purchased from Shakra. Marks the mysterious transport tubes of Pharloom.
items.label: Ventrica Pins

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
items.label: Shell Marker

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
items.label: Ring Marker

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
items.label: Hunt Marker

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
items.label: Dark Marker

items.description: Purchase from Shakra. These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
items.label: Bronze Marker

categories.label: Map Pins

categories.description: Stations unlocked throughout Pharloom that connect distant regions and aid swift travel.

items.description: Unlocked after defeating the Bell Beast. Connects the lower Bone Bottom with the rest of Pharloom.
items.label: Bone Bottom Station

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: Deep Docks Station

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: The Marrow Station

categories.description: The Ventrica are a system of tubes that run throughout the Citadel and Underworks, which Hornet can use to travel, similar to the Bellways. The Grand Bellway station connects the two systems of travel.

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: Terminus Tube

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: Underworks Tube

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: Grand Bellway Tube

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: Choral Chambers Tube

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: First Shrine Tube

items.description: Unlocked after paying Rosaries.
items.label: Memorium Tube

categories.label: Ventrica Stations

categories.description: Special single-instance items gathered and deposited the Bellhome in Bellhart before it can be used.

items.description: The Materium can be found in the upper part of the Memorium. The item must be constructed in the Bellhome in Bellhart before it can be used.
items.label: Materium

items.description: Found in The Abyss, in the upper east passage of Weavenest Absolom. The item must be constructed in the Bellhome in Bellhart before it can be used.
items.label: Farsight

categories.label: Misc Collectables
